text:
Slate Magazine - Washington, DC

Slate Magazine is hiring developers with experience with iOS, Django, and AngularJS (and/or other front-end platforms).

See tech job postings at https://jobs-slate.icims.com/jobs/search?ss=1&searchCategory...

All jobs (editorial, business, etc) at http://slate.com/jobs

Questions? Email me at doug.harris AT slate.com
